title: BRIEF-LogMeIn Reports Q1 EPS $0.56
text:
April 26 (Reuters) - LogMeIn Inc:
* LOGMEIN ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER 2018 RESULTS * Q1 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.21
* SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $1.208 BILLION TO $1.223 BILLION * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.18 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q1 REVENUE $280.3 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $277.4 MILLION
* Q2 REVENUE VIEW $282.4 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * FY2018 REVENUE VIEW $1.14 BILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q2 ADJUSTED EBITDA IS EXPECTED TO BE IN RANGE OF $107 MILLION TO $108 MILLION
* FISCAL YEAR 2018 ADJUSTED EBITDA IS EXPECTED TO BE IN RANGE OF $442 MILLION TO $450 MILLION
* SEES Q2 2018 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.25 TO $1.26
* SEES Q2 2018 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.03 TO $0.04 * SEES FY NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $5.20 TO $5.31
* SEES FY EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.85 TO $0.96 * Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.30 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $5.49 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon:
